speaker: Erika Mann (PSE). –
english: Erika Mann (PSE). – Mr President, I would like to ask the Commissioner if he could make a short comment on a question raised by many of our colleagues on granting market economy status to China.
original: Erika Mann (PSE). – Mr President, I would like to ask the Commissioner if he could make a short comment on a question raised by many of our colleagues on granting market economy status to China.
agenda_item: State of the European footwear sector one year after liberalisation (debate)
